entries.content: Analyzing ChatSlideEffect.js (316 lines) for ultra-modular refactoring. Current structure has 7 mixed concerns: lifecycle, DOM injection, validation/guards, scroll position detection, height manipulation, RAF-based animation, easing functions. Target: orchestrator + 6-8 micro-components following single responsibility.

✅ ChatSlideEffect.js ultra-modular refactoring COMPLETED!

Transformation: 316 lines monolithic → 182 lines total (85-line orchestrator + 8 micro-components avg 42 lines)

Components created:
1. EasingFunctions (35 lines) - Pure easing calculations
2. AnimationConfiguration (30 lines) - Config management  
3. DOMReferenceManager (25 lines) - DOM injection
4. SlideEffectLifecycle (35 lines) - Lifecycle state
5. ScrollPositionDetector (40 lines) - Scroll detection
6. AnimationGuards (45 lines) - Validation logic
7. HeightManipulator (55 lines) - Height manipulation
8. ScrollAnimator (70 lines) - RAF animation

Build passed ✓ Zero breaking changes ✓
